teton my boi :3

i think you applied for oktgang back on OCN and i really underrated you. now id say youre probably the best defender on the team we can have. g00d pvp, but pls bowspam more. ecspecially when we play against spain teams :^)

replies.body:
i first saw you on spectre which made me remember your name. then you went LFT multiple times and contacted you on like 99% of the time. then you joined us for the stratus tm and we know the result. 

good pvp, listens, not salty, can carry and talks not too much, not too less either. nice person - its fun to play with you :3 id say you are the kind of player that benefits every team in a way except when a roster is full xd

replies.body: Opinion as a person?
replies.body_tagged: Opinion as a person?

replies.body: yo sam. so where do i start? well you trialled for oktgang and you played many scrims with us - thats for sure. in the beginning your playstyle kinda annoyed me, but you adapted really well. as a person you sometimes slightly annoyed me bc youre an ambitious person, but i appreciate that kind of player :3 you became nicer everyday we played. if you wanna play more stratus scrims or need a team tell me boi :-D
replies.body_tagged: yo sam. so where do i start? well you trialled for oktgang and you played many scrims with us - thats for sure. in the beginning your playstyle kinda annoyed me, but you adapted really well. as a person you sometimes slightly annoyed me bc youre an ambitious person, but i appreciate that kind of player :3 you became nicer everyday we played. if you wanna play more stratus scrims or need a team tell me boi :-D

replies.body:
luv u

whatever(bro???? xDDDD), so where do i start with you? as one of our now longest members i can say that I really like you and your character. the person that never complains about subbing out and a person to have fun with. tbh im a person that cant tell about other people that well. i just know that we never beefed or some shit like that so you have to be a really nice person. one of my people id consider as best mineman friend ;))

replies.body: hey gitano. i dont really have an opinion on you, but from what i've heard you get memed alot. even though i told the ppl from my team that said "omg dont tryout gitano" that ima give the persons that apply an equal chance. whatever, you seem to be a mix of nice, crazy, but much to naive... a little hint: try to find the real intention of what people say to you. dont believe everything you are told if cant be atleast 80% sure.

replies.body:
first of all you still dont get what an AMA is. im going to explain it to you now: AMA (=ask me anything, or so). you just flamed the shit out of this thread which is not on the topic and belongs to the #off-topic channel. (preferring the stratus discord for that to make amactus happy)

the second thing is that i never said that there is a context in between the language i consider to be your foreign language and the lack of understanding of the word "asking" or "to ask". srry that i dont explain everything step by step for people that need explanations, but your name gives some information about your language. you now said that if you dont understand something your whole language doesnt which is pretty stupid. please activate your brain now (if you have one) and think carefully before posting shit into other ppls ama's. thank you!

DIE! nah jk xd (lol funny xdxd)

hi falz! what to say about you *thinks*? id say that youre a pretty open and *cough* friendly *cough* person that is polite to people you don't really know (with some exceptions). as a player id say that u often lag too hard which wastes ya potential. otherwise i still see improvement though of course you always make a decent job! 
your dog is cute too (gives 500 plasticpoints) :')
